parameters.name: Area
parameters.description:
The acceleration region where you want to prefetch the live content. Valid values:

*   domestic: regions in the Chinese mainland.
*   overseas: regions outside the Chinese mainland.
*   global: regions in and outside the Chinese mainland.

If you do not specify this parameter, the acceleration region configured for the domain name is used.

parameters.name: PlayUrl
parameters.description: The streaming URL. You can specify up to 100 streaming URLs in a request. Separate multiple streaming URLs with commas (,).

parameters.name: PreloadedEndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the prefetch task. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. Example: 2016-06-30T19:00:00Z. The interval between the start time and end time cannot exceed 6 hours.

parameters.name: PreloadedStartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the prefetch task. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. Example: 2016-06-29T19:00:00Z. If you do not specify this parameter, the prefetch task runs for 1 hour by default.
